Package services

Class ManagerService

Object
ManagerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IManagerService
public class ManagerService extends Object implements IManagerService
The ManagerService class implements the IManagerService interface and provides methods to manage orders, accounts, staff, branch menu items, and categories. It allows retrieving and updating orders, finding accounts by login ID, changing passwords, retrieving staff list, retrieving branch menu items, adding, editing, and removing branch menu items, retrieving branch name, displaying menu categories, adding categories, retrieving categories, getting the next item ID, and canceling orders.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws AccountNotFoundException, PasswordMismatchException, PasswordValidationException
      Changes the password for a given user.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface IManagerService
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password needs to be changed.
      oldPassword - The old password to be verified.
      newPassword - The new password to be set.
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException - If no account is found with the given user's login ID.
      PasswordMismatchException - If the old password provided does not match the account's current password.
      PasswordValidationException - If the new password is null, empty, or equals to "password".
